Fulfillment Update Events

Previous I Next

 

  • Fulfillment Update Order Events

  • Related Article(s)

Fulfillment Update Order Events

Fulfillment Update events can be used to capture any updates to Fulfillment attributes impacting the order or order lines without any changes to status and quantity. For example, in a store fulfillment flow, the Pickup Expiry Date for a Fulfillment may be changed when the customer calls up the store associate requesting for extending the last date for Pickup after the quantities are moved to Picked (3600) status in the order.

Sample API for Status Update Events

SampleAPIforOrderEvent:FulfillmentUpdate

{

    "ExternalMessageId": "CC100021",

    "OrderEvent": [

        {

            "ExternalMessageId": "CC100021",

            "EventTypeId": "FulfillmentUpdate",

 

            "OrderId": "CC10002",

            "ReleaseId": "CC100021",

            "ReleaseLineId": "1",

            "OrderLineAdditional": {

                "PickupExpiryDate": "2021-05-27T14:36:28.155"

            },

            "FulfillmentInfo": null

        }

    ]

}

 Note: Multiple fulfillment update events can be included in a single order event interface.

Fulfillment Update Event Validations

Validations performed during Fulfillment Update order event are: 

  • Event Type -  Event type should be a valid base event type ”FulfillmentUpdate” OR a valid extended event type defined in the entity extendedEventType. 
  • Release Id - Is mandatory and should be a valid release Id to update the attributes on order or order lines
  • ReleaseLineId - Is optional, if not provided then all the eligible release lines for the release is moved to the new status.
  • OrderLineAdditional - PickupExpiryDate should not be Null / empty

Note: If date/time mentioned in OrderLineAdditional - PickupExpiryDate in the Fulfillment Update order event is Null or is less than the current value of PickupExpiryDate on the orderLine.pickupExpiryDate, the value mentioned in the Fulfillment Update order event will not be persisted. 

Input Data Valid?
ReleaseId  Permitted
ReleaseId + ReleaseLineId Permitted
OrderId + OrderLineId Not Permitted

 

Status Update Event Impacts

Impacts on the Order Component

When an order event 'FulfillmentUpdate' is processed, the following Updates occur:

Order Updates  

  • orderLineAdditional.PickupExpiryDate will be updated with the new value interfaced in Fulfillment Update Order Event
  • If any Order Line Milestone is configured using the attribute orderLineAdditional.PickupExpiryDate, then the expected time of the respective MilestoneId for the Order Line will be updated accordingly to reflect the new value
  • If any Order Line Milestone is configured using the attribute orderLineAdditional.PickupExpiryDate and if any order line milestone Events are already generated, they will be re-triggered
Note: There will be no impact on the order lines status or quantities due to fulfillment update order event.
